byline.original: By ERIC SCHMITT and DIONNE SEARCEY

abstract: Military officials say dozens of Special Operations advisers are set to deploy to front lines of Nigeria's battle against West African militant group Boko Haram; it is latest deployment in fight against Islamic State and its allies.
lead_paragraph: The deployment of dozens of Special Operations advisers would push American troops hundreds of miles closer to the battle that Nigerian forces are waging against the militants.

headline.main: U.S. Plans to Put Advisers on Front Lines of Nigeria’s War on Boko Haram
headline.print_headline: U.S. Plans to Deploy Advisers to Help in War on Boko Haram

snippet: The deployment of dozens of Special Operations advisers would push American troops hundreds of miles closer to the battle that Nigerian forces are waging against the militants.
